headline: ‘Show Me the Money’: Record Gold Price Is Test for Top Miners
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Gold prices are hovering around record highs, but Barrick Gold Corp. and Newmont Corp. have frustrated investors by failing to capitalize on bullion’s rally. The next 10 days gives the top producers a chance to win back skeptical shareholders.Most Read from BloombergSaudi Arabia’s Neom Signs $5 Billion Deal for AI Data CenterNice Airport, If You Can Get to It: No Subway, No Highway, No BridgeSin puente y sin metro: el nuevo aeropuerto de Lima es una debacleThe Forgotten French Arc

headline: GLD: Recent Performance Further Solidifies The Investment Thesis
summary: The fact that the GLD has performed at par with the broader equity market is a major red flag for equities. Read more to see my thoughts on the fund.
